qas.question: How many French colonists were gained by British?
When was the deportation of Acadians?
Where did British resettle many Acadians?
Although some Acadians went to France and other destiantions, what North American city did many move to?
How many French colonists weren't gained by British?
How many French colonists were lost by British?
When was the deportation of Canadians?
Where did British kill many Acadians?
Although some Acadians went to France and other destiantions, what North American city did many not move to?

context: Britain gained control of French Canada and Acadia, colonies containing approximately <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><a0_3><a0_4><b4_0><b5_0>80,000<b5_0/><b4_0/><a0_4/><a0_3/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> primarily French-speaking Roman Catholic residents. The deportation of Acadians beginning in <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><a1_3><a1_4><b6_0>1755<b6_0/><a1_4/><a1_3/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> resulted in land made available to migrants from Europe and the colonies further south. The British resettled many Acadians <a2_0><a2_1><b7_0>throughout <a2_4>its <a2_2><a2_3>North American provinces<b7_0/><a2_4/><a2_3/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>, but many went to France, and some went to <a3_1><a3_2><a3_4><b8_0>New Orleans<b8_0/><a3_4/><a3_2/><a3_1/>, which they had expected to remain French. Some were sent to colonize places as diverse as French Guiana and the Falkland Islands; these latter efforts were unsuccessful. Others migrated to places like Saint-Domingue, and fled to <a3_0><a3_3>New Orleans<a3_3/><a3_0/> after the Haitian Revolution. The Louisiana population contributed to the founding of the modern Cajun population. (The French word "Acadien" evolved to "Cadien", then to "Cajun".)
